entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
